text:
Firmin Le Bourhis (1950 – 21 April 2018) was a French detective writer. He authored 32 detective novels over the course of 18 years. He wrote many novels regarding romance and politics. He was born in Finistère, France.
Le Bourhis died of a heart attack on his way to the Envolée des livres, a book festival in Châteauroux, aged 68.
